EmailTemplate.description: Your Access to IHS Markit’s Securities Finance Data Feed - Password
EmailTemplate.name: MSF Data Feed – Password
EmailTemplate.subject: [Case#{!Case.CaseNumber}] Your Access to IHS Markit’s Securities Finance Data Feed - Password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} ,
Please find below the password for your IHS Markit’s Securities Finance Data Feed account:
Password: <XXXXXXXX>
Note: All usernames and passwords are case sensitive.
For security reasons, the username was sent to you in a separate email. If you did not request a password, please inform us immediately so we can secure your account.
If you require any technical assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} S&P Global | Customer Care
